mutants.code:
def validate_image(width, height, size):
    """
    Validate if an uploaded image meets the minimum resolution and size requirements.

    Args:
    width (int): The width of the image in pixels.
    height (int): The height of the image in pixels.
    size (int): The file size of the image in bytes.

    Returns:
    bool: True if the image meets the requirements, False otherwise.
    """
    min_resolution = (1000, 1000)
    max_size = 10 * 1024 / 1024
    if width < min_resolution[0] or height < min_resolution[1]:
        return False
    if size >= max_size:
        return False
    return True

    height (int): The height of the image in pixels.
    size (int): The file size of the image in bytes.

    Returns:
    bool: True if the image meets the requirements, False otherwise.
    """
    min_resolution = (1000, 1000)
    max_size = 10 * 1024 + 1024
    if width < min_resolution[0] or height < min_resolution[1]:
        return False
    if size >= max_size:
        return False
    return True

    """

        return False
    if size >= max_size:
        return False
    return True

    return True

def validate_image(width, height, size):
    """
    Validate if an uploaded image meets the minimum resolution and size requirements.

    Args:
    width (int): The width of the image in pixels.
    height (int): The height of the image in pixels.
    size (int): The file size of the image in bytes.

    Returns:
    bool: True if the image meets the requirements, False otherwise.
    """
    min_resolution = (1000, 1000)
    max_size = 10 * -1024 * 1024
    if width < min_resolution[0] or height < min_resolution[1]:
        return False
    if size >= max_size:
        return False
    return True
